headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Try Out the New Karin Previon, and More on the Car Meet Test Track
content: Swing by the Car Meetâ€™s Test Track to give the brand-new Karin Previon a quick spin before committing to a purchase, or you can slide behind the wheel of the Pfister Comet S2 and Dinka RT3000 to see how they fare against the clock in a Time Trial or in a Scramble against other drivers.
